category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_search_flattening_links_on_save
preference.preference_description: When set to true, the Flattening links are managed by the integration during the save processes. When the link is built on a CATProduct not registered in the assembly, then the linked CATProduct is also saved in TcIC, if this one is accessible under the local disk.
